projects.name: Snake game
projects.description: A simple snake game made with HTML, CSS and JavaScript for practice. The user can controll the snake with WASD. Each time the snake eats a food, the snake grows, score increases and an obstacle is spawned.

projects.name: Travelling line.
projects.description: A simple travelling line made with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The user can controll the line length and speed. Also the ball size is customizable.

projects.name: Heikkil√§n tila
projects.description: A website for an client who sells berries. The website is made with WordPress and the theme is made with Adobe XD. This project is an collaboration with a classmate.

projects.name: WPHallinta
projects.description: A wordpress plugin for managing products, reservations and news.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: A simple weather mobile app made with React native and expo. The user can search for a city and get the current weather and a 2 hour forecast. Shows the temperature, windspeed and an icon. Also shows the estimate of the sunrise and sunset for the next day. Sadly theres an issue with the API so the forecast is not always working correctly.
